file_content.text: Metal screams like a windstorm. Bones fall like hail! Yet the Republic suffers more!
I've IDed the targets. How will you proceed?
Our bombers are getting torn apart. You need to pull them back.
Those who survive may retreat. But the fighters--their work must continue.
I point at things and they explode. I should bring air support more often.
Phase two begins now. The shields over Aegis Base are down, and Major Nedecca has sent the signal to arm your warhead.
Deliver it to the very center of the base! Make haste!
--can't override the security codes. I'm not your enemy--
I need those targets acquired faster! We're dying up here!
We only have one operative on the ground. Any more and they get caught in the kill zone.
Vynock Six, gone! Kilit Three, gone! Missiles locked and away!
